body:
- Omit final paren from regular expressions in cmd/flake8.py
- Allows long directives to be exempted even if they are wrapped.

This came up in #3928 - `flake8` wouldn't pass because the directives in `xsdk/package.py` are both long and wrapped.

@adamjstewart
title: spack flake8 should exempt line-wrapped directives
